trans-unit.source: Electrolyze deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets. Draw a card.

trans-unit.source: Flying Whenever you draw a card, Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind deals 1 damage to any target. {T}: Draw a card.

trans-unit.resname: PCMP·10 | Doran, the Siege Tower | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Each creature assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.
Each other Warrior creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it. Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.
{T}: Add {C}. {1}: Mutavault becomes a 2/2 creature with all creature types until end of turn. It's still a land.
